name: Unicorn
description: A mythical creature symbolizing purity and grace.

name: Werewolf
description: A human that transforms into a wolf during the full moon.

name: Kraken
description: A giant sea monster that terrorizes sailors.

name: Dragon
description: A legendary creature known for its massive wings, fiery breath, and immense power.

name: Goblin
description: A small, mischievous humanoid creature often found in caves or dark forests.

name: Phoenix
description: A mystical bird that rises from its own ashes, symbolizing renewal and immortality.

name: Griffin
description: A majestic creature with the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle.

name: Banshee
description: A spectral figure whose mournful wail is said to foretell death.
